prodNameC: "必帝" 對照用同型抗體試劑
ingredientsDesc: γ2a, clone X39, is composed of mouse IgG2a heavy chains and kappa light chains. γ1, clone X40, is composed of mouse IgG1 heavy chains and kappa light chains. The simultest reagent is supplied as a combination of γ2a FITC and γ1 PE in 1.0 ml of phosphate-buffered saline (PBS). Twenty microliters (20 μl) of the conjugated antibody stain 106 peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs). PBS contains gelatin and 0.1% sodium azide.\n\n
applicantName: 美商必帝股份有限公司台灣分公司

efficacy: 利用螢光免疫偵測與人體細胞非特異性結合之老鼠免疫球蛋白，做為對照劑使用。
